Immediately obtains 12 DP. Self and the Reinforcement gains ATK +10%; if the Reinforcement is a Melee unit, restores 1% HP every second and obtains 10% Sanctuary; if the Reinforcement is a Ranged unit, change attacks to fire 2 times at random targets within attack range

elite_levels.description: Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat from a Tactical Point, which copies part of of an Operator's attributes (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block, Attack Interval, Attack Range, damage type) and obtains a unique Trait effect based on Melee/Ranged position; Flowing Shapes automatically respawn 30 seconds after being defeated

Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat from a Tactical Point, which copies some attributes of an Operator (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block, Attack Interval, Attack Range, damage type) and obtains a unique Trait effect based on Melee/Ranged position; Flowing Shapes automatically respawn 28 seconds after being defeated

Can summon a Flowing Shape to assist in combat from a Tactical Point, which copies most attributes of an Operator (Max HP, ATK, DEF, RES, Block, Attack Interval, Attack Range, damage type) and obtains a unique Trait effect based on Melee/Ranged position; Flowing Shapes automatically respawn 25 seconds after being defeated
DP cost -2 when [Rhine Lab] Operators are in the squad; The first deployed [Rhine Lab] Operator gets DP Cost -1

potential_upgrades.description: DP cost -2 when [Rhine Lab] Operators are in the squad; The first deployed [Rhine Lab] Operator gets DP Cost -2 (+1)
